title: Build data ingestion pipeline for transcript processing
description:
Create a robust data ingestion pipeline that:
- Reads markdown transcript files with YAML frontmatter
- Chunks transcript text (300 chars, overlap 20)
- Generates embeddings using sentence-transformers/all-mpnet-base-v2
- Stores data in PostgreSQL (Transcript and VectorChunk tables)
- Handles batch processing and error recovery
- Provides CLI interface for bulk and incremental uploads

This extends existing pg_ingest.py functionality to be containerized and production-ready.
close_reason: Covered by conduit-transcripts-7oc and conduit-transcripts-nvb (unified CLI and ingestion)

title: Create Docker Compose infrastructure for transcript services
description:
Design and implement Docker Compose configuration for three services:

1. PostgreSQL Database Service:
   - PostgreSQL with pgvector extension
   - Persistent volume for data storage
   - Health checks and initialization scripts
   - Environment configuration

2. Transcript Ingestion Service:
   - Python service for processing transcripts
   - Access to transcript files via volume mount
   - Embedding generation capability
   - Scheduled or on-demand execution

3. MCP Server Service:
   - API server for Claude integration
   - Vector search capabilities
   - Connects to PostgreSQL
   - Exposes MCP-compliant endpoints

Include networking, volume management, environment variables, and orchestration for local development and deployment.
close_reason: Replaced by uv-managed apps and CLI. Docker services not strictly required for local dev now.
